thanks is not enough to my cute vardhanj i want  to something more like 
JADO KI JHAPHI

malikjee4.....not malik bhai

maliktpb@gmail.com
wow..vardhanji..truly great gift for someone u idiolize..kp it up bro

malik bhai... jadu ki jhaphi to u too my dear malik sir ji...sirji you do so much hard work for us..but i just gave a small gift dats it...itna karna toh banta hai...aur aap hee ho jisne mujhe inspire kiya hai kuch karne ke liye..so all thanks to u sir..we all love you malik bhai...

dont thank me guys..thank malik jee...its no big deal yaar, dat i upload a movie...i think we all should upload smthng, v hav in our collection...nd saurabh dont call me ji...im a 17 year old guy...
anyways guys im glad u likd it..

dear teen ager,
i m very happy to see ur loving comments for me for ur attachment with me i would like to say...
jab naam tera pyar se likhti hain unglian(vardhanj)
meri tarf zamane ki uthti hain unglian(malikjee4)

malik sirji.. thanks for your warm comments..sirji u mean a lot to us..u hav given us such masterpieces..such great movies we never in dreamt v wud able to see..but u ver lik the messiah of art films...u gav us  such great works..sir u knw bcoz of u i made an account on TPB..because i had to thank you......
sirji i hav a lot of respect for you and your work..keep it up sirji..sirf aap hee hum sab ka sahara hain....sir i will also contribute movies from my collection..love you sir...
MALIK SIRJEE I HAV UPLOADED ONE MORE..ONLY FOR YOU..PLZ MAKE NOTICE...HOPE YOU LIKE IT..
